entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Showers ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 24 March 2023
